# [Epic] Full Platform Integration - TikTok, Pinterest, YouTube

## Overview
Expand platform support to include TikTok, Pinterest, and enhanced YouTube.

## Stories
- [ ] ORB-051: Add TikTok integration
- [ ] ORB-052: Add Pinterest integration
- [ ] ORB-053: Add YouTube full integration
- [ ] ORB-054: Add Snapchat integration

## Acceptance Criteria
- OAuth flow for each new platform
- Posting and scheduling support
- Analytics collection and display
- Integrated into unified stream and inbox

## Dependencies
- Phase 3 complete

## Technical Notes
- TikTok Business API integration
- Pinterest API for pins and boards
- YouTube Data API v3 (already partial)
- Snapchat Marketing API
